  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)

  syl5bi(Prt(c0), hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 /. c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(hs1 =[hs2]c1 ∧ hs0 =[hs2]c1))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ hs1, hs0 =[hs2]c1)))

  r19.41v(hs1, c0, hs2 ∈ hs1, hs0 =[hs2]c1)

  19.9v(hs2, hs0 ∈(⋃ c0 /. c1))

blocks.name: prter3
blocks.content: For every partition there exists a unique equivalence relation whose quotient set equals the partition. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 19-Oct-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

thm prter3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(c2, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpancom(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(c2, c0), wrel(c0))

  adantl(wa(wrel(c2), wrel(c0)), wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  syl5bb(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wrex(hs2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  prtlem13(hs0, hs1, hs2, s0, s1, s2, c2, c1)
  bitr4d(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wrex(hs2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wrex(hs2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  rexbidva(hs2, c1, wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  pm5.32da(wa(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  anassrs(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wer(c0, cuni(c1)), wceq(cqs(cuni(c1), c0), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cec(cv(hs0), c0)))
